title: Bad 6g compiler line number error message
body:
$ hg identify
58102fac10c6+ tip

$ cat error.go
package main

import "os"

type Fooer interface {
	Foo(n int64) (n int64, err os.Error)
}

func main() {
}

$ 6g error.go
error.go:1: n redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at error.go:1
